rules: Welcome to KMQ. Type '!random' in chat and the bot will play
a random kpoop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first
person to guess the song name in chat.

actions.name: random
description: Bot plays a random song in VC;
type in your guess first to get a point

actions.name: stop
description: The bot leaves VC and reveals the answer to any ongoing games

actions.name: help
description: Get help about the game's commands. Add the action as
an argument to get information about specific arguments.

arguments.name: action
description: Any valid command for the KMQ bot
